verses.verse: Also, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> against you, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, even the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> high <S%H1116>places<s%> are ours in <S%H4181>possession<s%>:

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because they have made you <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, and swallowed you <S%H7602>up<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, that ye might be a <S%H4181>possession<s%> unto the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and ye are taken <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H3956>talkers<s%>, and are an <S%H1681>infamy<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>:

Therefore, ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and to the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, to the <S%H650>rivers<s%>, and to the <S%H1516>valleys<s%>, to the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H2723>wastes<s%>, and to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>, which became a <S%H957>prey<s%> and <S%H3933>derision<s%> to the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%>;

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Surely in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and against all <S%H123>Idumea<s%>, which have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%> into their <S%H4181>possession<s%> with the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of all their <S%H3824>heart<s%>, with <S%H7589>despiteful<s%> <S%H5315>minds<s%>, to cast it <S%H4054>out<s%> for a <S%H957>prey<s%>.

<S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> therefore concerning the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and to the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, to the <S%H650>rivers<s%>, and to the <S%H1516>valleys<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in my <S%H2534>fury<s%>, because ye have <S%H5375>borne<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>:

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; I have lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, Surely the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are <S%H5439>about<s%> you, they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%>.

¶ But ye, O <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, ye shall shoot <S%H5414>forth<s%> your <S%H6057>branches<s%>, and <S%H5375>yield<s%> your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for they are at <S%H7126>hand<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%>.
For, behold, I am for you, and I will <S%H6437>turn<s%> unto you, and ye shall be <S%H5647>tilled<s%> and <S%H2232>sown<s%>:

And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> upon you, all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even all of it: and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>, and the <S%H2723>wastes<s%> shall be <S%H1129>builded<s%>:

And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> upon you <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>; and they shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> and bring <S%H6509>fruit<s%>: and I will <S%H3427>settle<s%> you after your old <S%H6927>estates<s%>, and will do <S%H2895>better<s%> unto you than at your <S%H7221>beginnings<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Yea, I will cause <S%H120>men<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> upon you, even my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> thee, and thou shalt be their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and thou shalt no <S%H3254>more<s%> henceforth <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them of men.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because they <S%H559>say<s%> unto you, Thou land devourest <S%H398>up<s%> <S%H120>men<s%>, and hast <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> thy <S%H1471>nations<s%>;
Therefore thou shalt <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> no more, neither <S%H7921%H3782>bereave<s%> thy <S%H1471>nations<s%> any more, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

Neither will I cause men to <S%H8085>hear<s%> in thee the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> any more, neither shalt thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> any more, neither shalt thou cause thy <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H3782>fall<s%> any more, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
¶ Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, when the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their own <S%H127>land<s%>, they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it by their own <S%H1870>way<s%> and by their <S%H5949>doings<s%>: their <S%H1870>way<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> me as the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of a removed <S%H5079>woman<s%>.

Wherefore I <S%H8210>poured<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon them for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that they had <S%H8210>shed<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%>, and for their <S%H1544>idols<s%> wherewith they had <S%H2930>polluted<s%> it:

And I <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and they were <S%H2219>dispersed<s%> through the <S%H776>countries<s%>: according to their <S%H1870>way<s%> and according to their <S%H5949>doings<s%> I <S%H8199>judged<s%> them.

And when they <S%H935>entered<s%> unto the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, whither they <S%H935>went<s%>, they <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, when they <S%H559>said<s%> to them, These are the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and are gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H776>land<s%>.

¶ But I had <S%H2550>pity<s%> for mine <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, which the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, whither they <S%H935>went<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; I <S%H6213>do<s%> not this for your sakes, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but for mine <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, which ye have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, whither ye <S%H935>went<s%>.

And I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, which was <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, which ye have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them; and the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, when I shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

For I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you from <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of all <S%H776>countries<s%>, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into your own <S%H127>land<s%>.

¶ Then will I <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> upon you, and ye shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>: from all your <S%H2932>filthiness<s%>, and from all your <S%H1544>idols<s%>, will I <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you.

A <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> also will I <S%H5414>give<s%> you, and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> will I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you: and I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H68>stony<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> out of your <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you an <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you, and <S%H6213>cause<s%> you to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.
And ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and ye shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be your <S%H430>God<s%>.

I will also <S%H3467>save<s%> you from all your <S%H2932>uncleannesses<s%>: and I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for the <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and will <S%H7235>increase<s%> it, and <S%H5414>lay<s%> no <S%H7458>famine<s%> upon you.

And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and the <S%H8570>increase<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, that ye shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> no more <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>.

Then shall ye <S%H2142>remember<s%> your own <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and your <S%H4611>doings<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good<s%>, and shall <S%H6962>lothe<s%> yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and for your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

Not for your sakes <S%H6213>do<s%> I this, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, be it <S%H3045>known<s%> unto you: be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for your own <S%H1870>ways<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall have <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> you from all your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> I will also cause you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and the <S%H2723>wastes<s%> shall be <S%H1129>builded<s%>.
And the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H5647>tilled<s%>, whereas it lay <S%H8077>desolate<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all that passed <S%H5674>by<s%>.

And they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H1977>This<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> that was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> is become like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>; and the <S%H2720>waste<s%> and <S%H8074>desolate<s%> and <S%H2040>ruined<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are become <S%H1219>fenced<s%>, and are <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>.

Then the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H2040>ruined<s%> places, and <S%H5193>plant<s%> that that was <S%H8074>desolate<s%>: I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; I will yet for this be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> it for them; I will <S%H7235>increase<s%> them with <S%H120>men<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%>.

As the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6629>flock<s%>, as the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in her solemn <S%H4150>feasts<s%>; so shall the <S%H2720>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> be <S%H4392>filled<s%> with <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
